entries.description: Persistent dry cough, worse at night, affecting a 5-year-old Golden Retriever.  Possible kennel cough.
entries.indian_climate_factors: Dust and humidity exacerbate coughing during monsoon.
entries.breed_predisposition: Labradors and Golden Retrievers are prone to respiratory infections due to their size and susceptibility to allergies.
entries.age_considerations: Adult dogs are more susceptible to chronic respiratory issues.
questions_to_ask: How long has the cough persisted?
Has the dog been exposed to other dogs?
entries.home_care_india: Ensure adequate hydration, avoid dust exposure, use a humidifier during dry weather.
entries.vet_triggers: If cough worsens, becomes productive (with mucus), or is accompanied by lethargy.
entries.seasonal_variations: Worse during monsoon due to high humidity and dust.
entries.prevention_tips: Regular vaccination, avoid contact with sick dogs, use air purifiers.

entries.description: Loud snoring and noticeable breathing difficulty, especially during sleep, in a senior Bulldog.
entries.indian_climate_factors: Heat and humidity worsen breathing problems; increased panting.
entries.breed_predisposition: Brachycephalic breeds like Bulldogs are predisposed to breathing issues due to their short noses.
entries.age_considerations: Senior dogs are more vulnerable due to age-related degeneration.
questions_to_ask: How long has this been happening?
Does the dog struggle to breathe during exercise?
Is there any cyanosis (blue tinge to gums)?
entries.home_care_india: Keep the dog cool, use a fan, avoid strenuous activity during hot weather.
entries.vet_triggers: If breathing becomes labored, cyanosis appears, or the dog collapses.
entries.seasonal_variations: More severe during hot and humid months.
entries.prevention_tips: Maintain ideal weight, avoid overheating, regular vet checkups.

entries.description: A young German Shepherd exhibits wheezing after playing in dusty areas.
entries.indian_climate_factors: Dust and air pollution trigger wheezing, especially during dry seasons.
entries.breed_predisposition: German Shepherds can be susceptible to allergies and asthma.
entries.age_considerations: Young dogs may develop allergies early in life.
questions_to_ask: Has the dog been exposed to irritants?
entries.home_care_india: Avoid dusty areas, provide clean water, use air purifiers.
entries.vet_triggers: If wheezing becomes persistent or severe, or is accompanied by other symptoms.
entries.seasonal_variations: More pronounced during dry and dusty seasons.
entries.prevention_tips: Regular grooming, avoid exposure to irritants, use allergy-friendly bedding.

entries.description: A Labrador Retriever puppy has a clear nasal discharge and mild sneezing.
entries.indian_climate_factors: Monsoon season increases the risk of upper respiratory infections.
entries.breed_predisposition: Labrador Retrievers are not particularly predisposed to this but can be affected by environmental factors.
entries.age_considerations: Puppies have developing immune systems, making them vulnerable.
questions_to_ask: Is the discharge clear, white, yellow, or green?
entries.home_care_india: Keep the puppy warm and dry, provide supportive care.
entries.vet_triggers: If discharge becomes colored, thick, or accompanied by fever or lethargy.
entries.seasonal_variations: More common during monsoon.
entries.prevention_tips: Vaccination, avoid exposure to sick dogs.

entries.description: Excessive panting, even at rest, in an adult Golden Retriever, especially during hot and humid days.
entries.indian_climate_factors: High temperatures and humidity trigger excessive panting.
entries.breed_predisposition: Large breeds like Golden Retrievers and German Shepherds can overheat easily.
entries.age_considerations: Adult dogs are more susceptible to heatstroke than puppies.
questions_to_ask: How long has the excessive panting been occurring?
Is the dog's tongue excessively dry?
entries.home_care_india: Provide cool water, shade, and fans; wet the dog down.
entries.vet_triggers: If panting is excessive, gums are dry, or the dog shows signs of heatstroke (collapse, seizures).
entries.seasonal_variations: Worse during summer months.
entries.prevention_tips: Avoid strenuous activity during peak heat, provide adequate shade and water.
